name: Chocomize - Customize Your Chocolate!
tag_list: personalized-chocolate-bars, custom-chocolate, belgian-chocolate, unique-gift, mass-customization, co-creation, entrepreneurship, wedding-favors, corporate-chocolate-gifts, create-your-own-chocolate, chocolate-bars, premium-chocolate
overview:
Chocomize allows customers to create their own chocolate bars.

At www.chocomize.com people first choose their favorite Belgian chocolate base (dark, milk, or white) and then add up to five ingredients to their custom chocolate bar. The ingredients range from the common like almonds and cranberries to the very uncommon like real bacon, beef jerky, or 23 karat gold flakes. In total more than 300 million combinations are possible. The chocolate bars are hand-made in the US and shipped to the customers within 4 business days.

Since its launch in 2009, Chocomize has been featured in media outlets such as O! The Oprah Magazine, CNN, NY Times, Chicago Tribune, Bloomberg Businessweek, USA Today and many more.
